data.message: Woo hoo!!! Now the socks, pj's and t shirt can come out! Even though I was waiting for it I still got way too excited. But we need the long version.

replies.message: We're guessing you're all over Christmas already, Debbie?! #HolidaysAreComing
The ad is the start for me, I love it, I live Christmas, so magical. But yes I own the holidays are coming pj's, t shirt and was bought socks last year 😂 #holidaysarecoming
Good thinking Debbie, sweatshirt during the day tomorrow and pj's later. Didn't know you could get socks so that's my mission this year. I agree, we need the full ad 😃
Neither did I, until a friend who knows about my obsession with the ad bought me them 😂
This adverts is late this year. I always wait to see this advert then my tree can go up. As it happened I put it up yday and saw advert on tv last night.
